text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Predator Triton 700 PT715-51-761M 15.6" IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Acer Predator Triton 700 PT715-51-761M 15.6" IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the Acer Predator Triton 700 PT715-51-761M 15.6" IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
